snippet.title: Asteroids - Video Game early Trailer (PC/Playstation, 1998)
snippet.description:
Asteroids : official video game trailer.
Developed by Syrox Developments, Ltd.
Designed by Boat Drinks LLC
Published by Activision in 1998 for PC Windows and Playstation.
A Game Boy Color adaptation was released in 1999 and a Macintosh Port was published by MacSoft in 2000.
In this early trailer, the development team is still Quickdraw Developments Ltd.
Year : 1998 (trailer).

Trailer found on couvermount CD of french magazine Generation 4 (issue #114, September 1998)
